name: Shruti
wishText: May your day be filled with joy, laughter, and all the happiness in the world ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Finally, Happy Birthday to you for all the years to come. Life's journey always moves forward. So don't look back.
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
